sheep.input
Interface KeyboardListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Container, GameThread, State, TextButton, Widget
public interface KeyboardListener

An interface for classes which want to subscribe for events on the keyboard.

Method Summary
 boolean onKeyDown(android.view.KeyEvent event)
          Called when a key is pressed.
 boolean onKeyUp(android.view.KeyEvent event)
          Called when a key is released.
 

Method Detail

onKeyDown

boolean onKeyDown(android.view.KeyEvent event)
Called when a key is pressed.

Parameters:
event - The event generated by the action.
Returns:
True if event was consumed, false otherwise.

onKeyUp

boolean onKeyUp(android.view.KeyEvent event)
Called when a key is released.

Parameters:
event - The event generated by the action.
Returns:
True if the event was consumed, false otherwise.
